summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3101 for the improvement of Twenty-seventh Avenue North, from East Madison Street to East Denny Way, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 37750, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
